Class ModPlayers

java.lang.Object
at.setup_studios.mc_milsim.gameplay.player.ModPlayers
public class ModPlayers extends Object
Represents a player in the mod system with their associated data. This class manages player information including their Minecraft player instance, name, UUID, and team assignment.

      name - The player's display name
      player - The Minecraft player instance

  • Method Details

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player)
      Updates the player instance and synchronizes the player's name. This is useful when player data needs to be updated after reconnection.
      Parameters:
      player - The new Minecraft player instance

    • setTeam

      public void setTeam(Teams team)
      Assigns the player to a specific team.
      Parameters:
      team - The team to assign the player to

    • getUUID

      public UUID getUUID()
      Retrieves the player's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      The UUID of the player

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the player's display name.
      Returns:
      The name of the player

    • getTeam

      public Teams getTeam()
      Retrieves the player's current team assignment.
      Returns:
      The team the player is assigned to, or null if not assigned to any team

    • getPlayer

      public net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player getPlayer()
      Retrieves the Minecraft player instance.
      Returns:
      The current Minecraft player instance

    • hasTeam

      public boolean hasTeam()
      Checks if the player is currently assigned to a team.
      Returns:
      true if the player is on a team, false otherwise
